me.ashtheking.island

Class ModuleSea

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ashtheking.island.Module
      • me.ashtheking.island.ModuleSea

  • public class ModuleSea
extends Module
    ModuleSea generates a basic colored heightmap, and takes into account water and land. The highest elevation is white, while the deepest oceans are blue.
    Author:
    Ashwin

    • Method Detail

      • getColors

        public java.awt.Color[][] getColors(double[][] heightmap,
                           boolean[][] water)
        Provides a basic color map based off elevation. If the tile is marked as water, assign it as dark blue or blue based off it's height. Otherwise, assign the elevation map from light green to dark green to white.
        Specified by:
        getColors in class Module
        Parameters:
        heightmap - The elevation map passed on from IslandGen
        water - The water map passed on from IslandGen
        Returns:
